dumriya riyaduran aarakshaka nithiya kriyathmaka kirima nisa pana nagi athi gataluwata kadinam wisandumak laba dimata katayuthu karana bawa prawahana niyojya amathi rohana disanayaka mahatha dinaminata pawasiya.dumriya riyaduran aarakshaka nithiya kriyathmaka kirima nisa siyaluma dumriyan eeyeth (12) boho pramada wima nisa magin dadi apahasuthawata path wuha.dumriya pramadaya aniwaryayenma walakwa magi janathawata honda prawahana sewayak labadiya yuthu bawath ee sandaha wishesha kamituwakda path karana bawada niyojya amathiwaraya pawasiya.me pilibanda dumriya riyaduran saha wruththiya samithi samanga ekangathwayakata pamina adala gataluwata ikmanin wisadumak labadena bawada wadiduratath niyojya amathiwaraya pawasiya.me sambandhayen dinamina lokomotew dumriya riyaduru sangamaye pradhana lekam ke.ee.yu.konthasinha mahathagen kala wimasimedi ee mahatha pawasuwe meya wruththiya samithi kriyamargayak nowana bawath dumriya baladharin panawa athi nithi rithi kriyathmaka kirimak pamanak bawathya.

me kamants dakkama puduma dukak danenawa.ape minissu kochchara mannekin wagema deweshayakin jiwath wenawada kiyala.aththatama dan ithuru wela inne kalakanni jathiyak.kisima dekata kisima garuthawayak naha.eka ekage wathkam himikam walata eershiya kara kara jiwath wenawa.me anda balayo kohoma dangaluwath budun deshana karapu dahama wenas wenneth naha wenas karannath baha.wenne ekama deyayi me dahamata apahasa karana balayo thawa thawath dukema galena ekayi.
